captions.text: (Narrator) See those glowing specs of light?
(Narrator) Fragments of spirit, scattered through the whole of this little maze
(Narrator) Gather them all, and the first puzzle piece will be revealed
(Narrator) A little something I plugged from your worst nightmares
(Narrator) ...where you start running for your life
Hello everybody, my name is Markiplier and welcome to Dark Deception I think is the name of the game
And apparently, this is a lot like Pac-Man
Which is wierd 'cause I just played an impossible game of Pac-Man earlier
A murder monkey is after me
Oh my god, that's a lot of shards
wooo they give you an early start
That'll... that'll wake you up better than coffee
Ok so, I got my little uh, monkey friend coming at me
uhuh uki aka don't kill me, please
don't murder me in the face
that'd be much appreciated if you didn't
where is he? I hear him

I got a little mini-map
I barely had time to register what was going on
before I was thrust sudussly into the
Hahaha, wait a minute hang on

aah! Okay, he's a little bit closer than I thou...
AAH! There's two! AAAH!

Monkey kill? Jeez... Oh... Oh oh, it is like Pac...
Oh, is that my blood on the wall? Probably not
(Narrator) You gahtered half of the shards

Good, thank you, lady
Who is apparently a...
What'd you say? Did you say something about me?

What? Who? Oh, hi!
You're a bit of a swishy swashy with these swordy wordies
Ahh, I need to go this way
Ahh, I try to watch my minimap and also listening to where they are
But it's hard to listen when i'm yelling in my own ear

Blach, blach
Get away from me, monkey, you monkey douche
That's really cool, the way they round the corners

AAH! Whaswa aha
I don't know what I expect..aah okay
Hi, hello friend, how are you doing over there?
Aah, no you back up, you son of a biiitch

I know he's behind me, lady, thank you very much,
I'm very well aware of where he is
This's good, this's good, I like this
This is my favourite thing, actually
Who's a little monkey? Whos a litt...ughughughAAHGHA!
I shouldn't be messing with the monkeys, but they're just so fun to mess with
Keep going? I am going. I'm nearly there

They're nearly at my butt.
They're trying to stab me in my patuty
I don't know, what I was trying to do there
I'm going around the outer perimeter first, because that's a more grecious method of which way I can do this

Oh, hi!
Wait a minute I need to go there

I'm gonna do it
That old lady ain't got nothing on me
So where am I going, okay, let's go this way

Playin' it out,
I hear him

"Press 'e' to interact"?
what does that even mean?

Why can I do that? Let me out!
There are murder monkeys after me

Oh, that's a painting of the monkeys,
look at them, they're so adorable

Hey, that looks just like you!
I'm gonna run away now
Aah! FFuu...okay not going that way

Hi, uhm I needed to go there, so if you could not be a son of a bitch,
that'd be delightful
Why is there a monkey portal?

Come on, come on big boy
Waah big boy

That's right
That's right, get it right, get it tight

Oooh I'm about to get it
Oh no, oh what's that?
AAH! WHY IS IT NOT OVER?
Oh, well if it's that all I need then...

Ohh, what's that? I'm about to get the blue
Whatya doin'?

That was surprisingly really fun
I'm gonna be perfectly honest, is there any more to that?

Aww man...
Aww I thought there was gonna be more
I'm gonna mess with the murder monkeys just a little bit more
Hello! Monkey see, monkey don't kill me please
Oh, you such a big boy, ain't ya?

You such...
eww you're a little too close to me
You such big boy, ain't ya?

That's really gotta good animanations,
I gotta admit

Eww, aah, too close!
Very too close!
Stranger danger!
I really do wonder if one of these doors does open

Now, there's too many friends
I don't need that many friends

Boop! Got 'em all
I'm the winner
Still don't know what that big old oooh...
Okayy! Here we go, I beat it twice now

That wasn't bad, that was acutally really fun
I'm actually quite surprised

That was an innovative mechanic I guess
if you can call Pac-Man innovative

But either way, that was lot of fun
You can check the description down below

Let me know what you think of this,
and I think this is just a demo so,
a full version may be coming out in the future

either way, this was really cool, so thank you all so much for watching
click the annotations for more videos that I've done

And as always:
I will see YOU, in the next video
